attributes.title: Black Cauldron Imperial Stout
attributes.description:
Created on November 22, 2010 by KellyB on Sourcemap.org:

Boasts flavors of chocolate and coffee, along with raisins and dried fruit soaked in sherry. This beer is best with full-flavored grilled meats or chocolate.

attributes.name: Black Cauldron Imperial Stout
attributes.title: Black Cauldron Imperial Stout
attributes.description: Boasts flavors of chocolate and coffee, along with raisins and dried fruit soaked in sherry. This beer is best with full-flavored grilled meats or chocolate.

attributes.name: Barley
attributes.title: Barley
attributes.description: The barley in this particular beer comes from local growers within 100 miles of the brewery.

attributes.name: Barley
attributes.title: Barley
attributes.description: A small portion of the barley is imported from Germany, though most is from local growers.

attributes.name: Hops
attributes.title: Hops
attributes.description: All the hops for the Black Cauldron Imperial Stout come from the Western Untied States, particularly Washington.

attributes.name: Water
attributes.title: Water
attributes.description: The local water is one of the main ingredients in all the brews from the Grand Teton Brewery.

attributes.name: Glass
attributes.title: Glass
attributes.description: The glass for the bottles is trucked in from Colorado to the Brewery in Idaho.

attributes.name: Labels
attributes.title: Labels
attributes.description: The labels for all the beers at the Grand Teton Brewery are put on trucks and transported to the Brewery in Idaho from Wisconsin.
